price: Dize, Muhammad, aos que renegam a Fé: "Sereis vencidos e reunidos na Geena." E que execrável leito!
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul lilladhīna kafarū satugh'labūna watuḥ'sharūna ilā jahannama wabi'sa al-mihādu
